item.title: AJ - ★★
item.description: I personly didnt like this one.. there lots of options and features but i dont know.. its not a survival or clear action game. This is for people who wants skin and play gun game.. literally a kid game. Thats what i experienced while i played through smart phone
item.author: AJ
